name: Neon Genesis Evangelion 1990s Anime Style LoRA
description:
Neon Genesis Evangelion 1990s Anime style LoRA

Making models can be expensive. Do you like what I do? Consider supporting me on Patreon 🅿️ or feel free to buy me a coffee ☕


One of the best anime/manga ever made. Use this with AnyLoRA and similar models at around weight 1. Increase the fidelity with the trigger evangelion anime style. Could also help adding anime screencap, 1990s_\(style\) to get more flat colors and 1990s anime noise.

I also suggest you select "None" as the upscaler for highres.fix.
I posted examples using both "None" and R-ERSGAN AnimeVideo, so you can see the difference. The latter is too much "clean" and loses the noise effect.

Keep in mind this is not a character LoRA, so while it can imitate characters from their descriptions (as shown) you might need additional character LoRA/embedding to increase the accuracy. The purpose of this LoRA is to make any character with this style, not only Persona characters.

How to use LoRA's in auto1111:

  • Update webui (use git pull like here or redownload it)

  • Copy the file to stable-diffusion-webui/models/lora

  • Select your LoRA like in this video

  • Make sure to change the weight (by default it's :1 which is usually too high)
